title: mandriva-linux-PWP-2011-i586.iso
description:
Here we are right now.
Well this time such bringing you now the very newest release of :

Mandriva powerpack 2011 full retail x86 or 32 bit edition anyway.
Beware as Mandriva decided to change few options in this new opus.
You will need therefore now to enter a serial for get a full working os aswell.
I don't provide any serial for this torrent,it is just the original DVD iso,
no more.
This version comes directly from Mandriva store .

Note:
libtorrent,MediaGet are still accepted,but please,give a suffisant up speed then.
Too much libtorrent peers are still really too slow so far.
More your internet speed is slow,more you will to give some up speed aswell.
Fast peers,please,don't give more than 35 ko/s as up speed for avoiding to disadventage all slow peers.
Any fast peer doesn't need to give a huge up speed and in most of time,
30 ko/s is largely enought then.
Be observative and adjust your settings while downloading as necessary job
if this needed.
Goal consisting to get the best balanced torrent as possible.
Seeding is not so easy as some of you could think and this way,we must all working in cooperative mode for best results anyway.
Ty for understanding.

Learn more about the full release note of this new version here below right now :
 <a href="
http://wiki.mandriva.com/en/2011.0_Notes" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://wiki.mandriva.com/en/2011.0_Notes</a>

wish you have a nice day and plesant download aswell.
Best regards and don't forget to seed a bit,please.
